item.description:
The weather is looking to be great this weekend, so scheduling a meetup at Dark Brook Reservoir in Auburn. Dark Brook Reservoir is just west of I-290 and is viewable from the Mass Pike. We will be launching south of the pike and will paddle our way across the reservoir and through the culvert under the highway which leads to the northern side of the reservoir.

For more information:

http://www.mass.gov/d...


Directions:

Take I-290 (towards the mass pike) to Route 12 South. Continue straight through three to four lights and take a right onto West Street (right before Outback Steakhouse). The ramp will be less than 500 yards on the right. You have gone too far if you go under the highway.
item.name: Kayak Dark Brook Reservior (Auburn)
